greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular array T(n,k) = A005940(1+A156552(n)+A156552(k)), read by rows, with n >= 1, 1 <= k <= n.
comment: A341510 is the main entry for this dyadic function. See comments there.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10440; the first 144 rows of the triangle
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
program: A341511list(up_to) = { my(v = vector(up_to), i=0); for(n=1,oo, for(k=1,n, i++; if(i > #v, return(v)); v[i] = A341510sq(n,k))); (v); };
xref: The lower triangular region of A341510 read by rows.
Cf. A000027 (the left edge), A003961 (the right edge).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 15 2021
